scripts.dev:e2e: SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION=true DISABLE_RATE_LIMIT=true NEXT_E2E=true pnpm exec infisical run --env=staging -- pnpm exec next dev -p 3001
scripts.dev:e2e:ci: SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION=true DISABLE_RATE_LIMIT=true NEXT_E2E=true pnpm exec infisical run --projectId=082d5863-19f4-49d4-88fc-429990db8d3e --env=staging -- pnpm exec next dev -p 3001
scripts.dev:e2e:ratelimit: NEXT_E2E=true DISABLE_RATE_LIMIT=false pnpm exec infisical run --env=staging -- pnpm exec next dev -p 3001
scripts.test:int: pnpm exec infisical run --projectId=082d5863-19f4-49d4-88fc-429990db8d3e --env=staging -- pnpm exec vitest -c vitest.integration.config.ts --run
scripts.test:int:coverage: pnpm exec infisical run --projectId=082d5863-19f4-49d4-88fc-429990db8d3e --env=staging -- pnpm exec vitest -c vitest.integration.config.ts --run --coverage
scripts.test:e2e: DISABLE_RATE_LIMIT=true pnpm exec infisical run --projectId=082d5863-19f4-49d4-88fc-429990db8d3e --env=staging -- pnpm exec playwright test
